predicate.note: Frames file for 'rankle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1, Framenet entry Experiencer obj.

example.name: passive, nasty trace chain
example.text: He was a ``socialist warrior'' who [*T*-1] felt [*-2] rankled [*-3] by West Germany's enormous postwar prosperity and the Bonn government's steadfast refusal to recognize the legitimacy of his state.
example.arg: West Germany's enormous postwar prosperity and the Bonn government's steadfast refusal to recognize the legitimacy of his state
